snippet: In a letter to the chairman of a House committee that had subpoenaed the director of political strategy last week, the president’s top lawyer said Tuesday that the director had immunity as a member of the executive branch.
abstract: Obama administration says it will refuse to allow its director of political strategy, David Simas, to testify before Republican-led House committee investigating whether administration illegally conducted political activity in White House.
lead_paragraph: In a letter to the chairman of a House committee that had subpoenaed the director of political strategy last week, the president’s top lawyer said Tuesday that the director had immunity as a member of the executive branch.
